title: The Exchange: Breakingviews at Reuters Next
description:
At the global conference, our columnists interviewed the movers and shakers at Ola Electric, Philip Morris, ViacomCBS and Klarna about disruption at scale in India, the challenges of making bold corporate transitions in tobacco and media, and Europe’s fintech frenzy.  

 See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
